Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Pullman Marseille Palm Beach in Marseille (La Corniche), you'll be minutes from Prado Beach and close to Notre-Dame de la Garde. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Parc Borely and Borely Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 160 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a sauna, and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, where you can take in a pool view and dine alfresco (weather permitting). Or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a computer station, and express check-in. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 7 AM
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, where you can take in a pool view and dine alfresco (weather permitting). Or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Prado Beach - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Parc Borely - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Borely Beach - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Notre-Dame de la Garde - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Escale Borely - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Le Chateau Borely - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
International Fair and Exhibition Center Marseille - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Parc Chanot Convention and Exhibition Center - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Velodrome Stadium - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Place Castellane - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
26th Centenary Park - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Abbaye de Saint Victor - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Fort Saint Nicholas - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Plage des Catalans - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
La Criee National Theater of Marseille - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi

The preferred airport for Pullman Marseille Palm Beach is Marseille (MRS-Marseille - Provence) - 22.6 km / 14.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
